Uses of Package
br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization

  • Packages that use br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization

  • Classes in br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization used by br.com.caelum.vraptor.observer 
    Class and Description
    Deserializers 
  • Classes in br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization used by br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization 
    Class and Description
    Deserializee
    Used in GsonDeserialization to define some behaviors of deserializtion.
    Deserializer
    Deserializes request body according to a given content type.
    Deserializers 
    Deserializes
    Indicates that annotated class will deserialize specified content types
    I18nMessageSerialization
    Basic i18n messsage json serialization alias.
    JSONSerialization
    Basic json serialization support using a Json SerializerBuilder.
    NoRootSerialization
    Creates a serializer of a given format with out ROOT alias.
    RepresentationResult
    Chooses a serializer to serialize an object.
    Serialization
    Creates a serializer of a given format.
    Serializer
    Serializes given object, including and excluding fields.
    SerializerBuilder
    SerializerBuilder used on internal API to build a Serializer object.
    XMLSerialization
    Basic xml serialization support using a xml BasicSerializer.
  • Classes in br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization used by br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.gson 
    Class and Description
    Deserializee
    Used in GsonDeserialization to define some behaviors of deserializtion.
    Deserializer
    Deserializes request body according to a given content type.
    DeserializerConfig
    Used by Consumes options to configure Deserializee and change the GsonDeserialization behavior.
    Deserializes
    Indicates that annotated class will deserialize specified content types
    JSONPSerialization
    Basic jsonp serialization support using the Json Builder.
    JSONSerialization
    Basic json serialization support using a Json SerializerBuilder.
    NoRootSerialization
    Creates a serializer of a given format with out ROOT alias.
    Serialization
    Creates a serializer of a given format.
    Serializee 
    Serializer
    Serializes given object, including and excluding fields.
    SerializerBuilder
    SerializerBuilder used on internal API to build a Serializer object.
